original: intros u k l. split. - intros Hlimsup eps. specialize (Hlimsup eps). destruct Hlimsup as [Hlimsup1 Hlimsup2]. split. + intros N. specialize (Hlimsup1 N). destruct Hlimsup1 as [n [Hn1 Hn2]]. exists (n + k)%nat. split. * lia. * apply Hn2. + destruct Hlimsup2 as [N HN]. exists N. intros n Hnk. apply HN. lia. - intros Hlimsup eps. specialize (Hlimsup eps). destruct Hlimsup as [Hlimsup1 Hlimsup2]. split. + intros N. specialize (Hlimsup1 N). destruct Hlimsup1 as [n [Hn1 Hn2]]. exists (n - k)%nat. split. * lia. * apply Hn2. + destruct Hlimsup2 as [N HN]. exists N. intros n Hnk. apply HN. lia.
